title: Where are the members of the Indian band 'Band of Boys'? - Quora

response.answer_text: A Band of Boys, formed in 2001, initially formed with 5 members , soonone decided to quit.  1)     Karan Oberoi2)     Sudhanshu Pandey3)     Sherrin Varghese4)     Siddharth Haldipur 5)     Chintoo Bhosale    The band also did a movie titled “Kis Kis Ko” in 2004, which didn’t fared well at the box office. Here’s what each one of them doing lately. Karan Oberoi –     Perhaps the most famous of all the members, this guy has shown his talent as a singer, actor  and  an anchor . Few daily soaps he acted in are :·        Jassi Jaisi Koi Nahi·        Swabhimaan·        Dishayen·        Zindagi Badal Sakta Hai Hadsaa  Filmography ·        Kiss Kis Ko (2004)·        Survival Code (AKA "Borealis") (TV film) (2013)   During the serial “Jassi Jaisi Koi Nahi”,,, a lot spiced up between mona singh and karan .(not me  :p , media reports saying )   Sudhanshu Pandey –     He debuted in Bollywood as an actor with the movie “Khiladi 420”. He also had roles in Bollywood blockbusters Singham , Singh is king and Murder 2 .  Sherrin Varghese  This guy is still rocking Mumbai with his music. He performs live vocal electronica on all sub genres of Electronic Dance Music Do check his FB page- Facebook Siddharth Haldipur      He is part of the Sangeet Siddharth music director duo. This duo has been composing songs for famous Bollywood flicks  like  Murder 2, Blood Money, Aatma, Fruit & Nut, Bird Idol and Hum Hai Raahi Car  Ke.  Chintoo Bhosale Chintoo could be seen on stage playing some cool acoustic folks.
